metadata.name: UAC Bypass Using Consent and Comctl32 - File
metadata.comment: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using consent.exe and comctl32.dll (UACMe 22)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\consent.exe.@')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\comctl32.dll')))

output.summary: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using consent.exe and comctl32.dll (UACMe 22)
